official-title.#text:
To prohibit an increase in the lands administered by the
		  Bureau of Land Management until a centralized database of all lands identified
		  as suitable for disposal by Resource Management Plans for lands under the
		  administrative jurisdiction of the Bureau is easily accessible to the public on
		  a website of the Bureau.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the
